LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Winter.label: Miho Beanie
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Mask_Eltex.label: Miho Eltex Mask
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Mask_Eltex.description: This is a psychic enhancement mask made of ebony wood and jade.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Sorceress.label: Miho Sorceress Hat
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Sorceress.description: This is a high-end hat that activates the mechanites within the body.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_EltexCaptain.label: Miho Eltex Officer Cap
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_EltexCaptain.descriptio: An officer cap worn by high-ranking officers of the Miho Empire. Grants access to the charge command skill. Used officer uniforms that occasionally appear on the market are popular due to their fetishistic appeal
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_ShooterCap.label: Miho Tactical Cap
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_ShooterCap.description: It is a hard cap hat that looks tactical. Someone took all the contents of the headset. It doesn't matter anyway, since it's useless due to the different ears.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Militia.label: Miho Trooper Helmet
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Militia.description: Helmet given to soldiers. The focus is on aim assist.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_MilitiaEar.label: Miho Trooper Helmet (Ears)
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_MilitiaEar.description: Helmet given to soldiers. It is even better because it protects your ears.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_MilitiaVegi.label: Miho Trooper Helmet (Camo)
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_MilitiaVegi.description: Helmet given to soldiers. It is even better because it protects your ears. The camouflage-like plants are not for camouflage, but for decoration and snacks.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_MilitiaMedic.label: Miho Medic Helmet
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_MilitiaMedic.descriptio: This helmet is issued to military doctors. The emphasis is on survivability.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_MilitiaShoot.label: Miho Trooper Helmet
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_MilitiaShoot.descriptio: A helmet issued to soldiers. The focus is on aim assist. Something is written on it in some strange language.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Worker.label: Miho Hard Hat
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Worker.description: A helmet is essential when working in a hazardous area. Of course, it's better than getting injured or losing your life.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_PMC.label: Miho Elite Trooper Helmet
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_PMC.description: This helmet is given to PMC soldiers. The focus is on protection.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Pariah.label: Miho Pariah Battle Helmet
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Pariah.description: An anti-psychic helmet powered by the mechanites in the user's body. It aims for long-distance combat capabilities and perfect user protection.
